code: import _toConsumableArray from"/Users/jenniffermelchiade/Desktop/2209-Coursework/practice/React/react-simpleSite/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/toConsumableArray.js";import _slicedToArray from"/Users/jenniffermelchiade/Desktop/2209-Coursework/practice/React/react-simpleSite/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/slicedToArray.js";import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Main=function Main(){var _useState=useState([]),_useState2=_slicedToArray(_useState,2),comments=_useState2[0],setComments=_useState2[1];var _useState3=useState(""),_useState4=_slicedToArray(_useState3,2),commentText=_useState4[0],setCommentText=_useState4[1];var _useState5=useState({spanish:"Elijo hacer un proyecto individual y el tema que selecciono abordar\xE1 los impactos de la inmigraci\xF3n. Quiero realizar una encuesta enfocada en identificar preferencias culturales y normas ling\xFC\xEDsticas, como el uso del Spanglish en Norteam\xE9rica, el ser biling\xFCe o pluriling\xFCe, y el sentido de nacionalismo y otros impactos psicol\xF3gicos y filos\xF3ficos de la identidad que perduran principalmente en la primera generaci\xF3n en el extranjero. Entrevistar\xE9 a personas extranjeras de primera generaci\xF3n o aquellas que han vivido en los Estados Unidos durante al menos 5 a\xF1os. Esto no se limitar\xE1 a aquellos de ascendencia hispana o latina. Recopilar los datos de la encuesta, como la demograf\xEDa de edad y etnia, ayudar\xE1 a generar valores cuantitativos y, por lo tanto, visualizaci\xF3n de datos. Ling\xFC\xEDsticamente, me gustar\xEDa estudiar el comportamiento humano de los biling\xFCes o pluriling\xFCes y sus impactos psicol\xF3gicos, como si se sienten c\xF3modos hablando abiertamente en el idioma de sus padres, en p\xFAblico o con amigos. Adem\xE1s, si disfrutan compartiendo m\xFAsica y comida de su cultura o si prefieren las normas, culturas, comidas y m\xFAsica occidentales (estadounidenses), etc. Planeo entrevistar a un pu\xF1ado de personas para recopilar sus respuestas, junto con cualquier foto o imagen que pueda obtener. Algunos contenidos previstos para este proyecto son: una lista de individuos con su identidad \xE9tnica o herencia, im\xE1genes de los alimentos, costumbres, m\xFAsica u otros elementos que prefieran, y un resumen para interpretar mis hallazgos en una p\xE1gina web.",english:"I choose to do an individual project, and the topic I have chosen will address the impacts of immigration. I want to conduct a survey focused on identifying cultural preferences and linguistic norms, such as the use of Spanglish in North America, being bilingual or multilingual, and the sense of nationalism and other psychological and philosophical impacts of identity that mainly persist in the first generation abroad. I will interview first-generation immigrants or those who have lived in the United States for at least 5 years. This will not be limited to those of Hispanic or Latino heritage. Collecting survey data, such as age and ethnicity demographics, will help generate quantitative values and, therefore, data visualization. Linguistically, I would like to study the human behavior of bilinguals or multilinguals and their psychological impacts, such as whether they feel comfortable speaking openly in their parents' language, in public or with friends. Additionally, whether they enjoy sharing music and food from their culture or if they prefer Western (American) norms, cultures, cuisines, and music, etc. I plan to interview a handful of people to gather their responses, along with any photo or image I can obtain. Some planned content for this project includes: a list of individuals with their ethnic or heritage identity, images of preferred foods, customs, music, or other elements, and a summary to interpret my findings on a web page."}),_useState6=_slicedToArray(_useState5,2),introText=_useState6[0],setIntroText=_useState6[1];var _useState7=useState(true),_useState8=_slicedToArray(_useState7,2),showSpanish=_useState8[0],setShowSpanish=_useState8[1];var handleTranslate=function handleTranslate(){setShowSpanish(!showSpanish);};var handleSubmitComment=function handleSubmitComment(e){e.preventDefault();if(commentText.trim()==="")return;setComments([].concat(_toConsumableArray(comments),[commentText]));setCommentText("");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"main-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"title",children:"SWAG"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"subheader",children:"Spanglish Web Application Generaci\xF3n 1"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"video-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("iframe",{width:"560",height:"315",src:"https://www.youtube.com/embed/nVgOV4x7MmU",title:"YouTube video player",frameBorder:"0",allow:"accelerometer;
